name: places/ChIJURenCnxZwokR7IQHO_ZpksE
formattedAddress: 140 E 55th St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 140 E 55th St, New York, NY 10022-4513, USA

originalText.text:
I came here to have a pair of suede boots cleaned and I'm absolutely amazed at the work they did!

I had some water damage in my closet when a pipe burst in the apartment above me, and I cried so hard when I saw the state of my favorite boots.  Dirty, covered in water stains, and a little puckered near the top...I just assumed they were a lost cause.

The man at the front desk was so kind and understanding.  He said he'd do everything he could to fix the damage, but he also made sure to be honest with me about setting realistic expectations.  He joked and said, "I don't have shoe-elves come in at night to help, like in the old stories.  But I will do the best I can."

And his best was phenomenal!  My boots have never looked so good and I am thrilled with the results.  I will definitely be coming back here for all of my future shoe cleaning/repair needs, no questions asked.

originalText.text: Left my shoes with them 1 week ago, and they very clearly said they would be ready the following week both verbally and on my ticket. Seemed like a long time, but it's the holidays so I let it slide. I arrived a week later and they tried to gaslight me into thinking I had the date wrong. They didn't attempt to help me solve the problem at all, and essentially offered me a refund or that I could come back in another week. I took my refund and brought my shoes a block over to Infinity Shoe Repair, and they had them fixed beautifully within hours. Don't waste your time!

originalText.text: When I initially went to this shoe repair shop , I asked the man at the front desk for advice on whether he could fix a patent leather shoe that was a bit torn on the bottom due to NYC infamous potholes and grates .  He appeared to be pretty friendly at that time  and they were located next to my place of work therefore I brought another shoe for servicing. When I returned with my black suede over the knee boots with a similar issue the man could not find my shoe initially and then  I was told my shoe was not ready and they needed a bit more time. I informed him that I purposely chose the date and time because I could not return at a later time and planned on wearing the shoes this weekend therefore I would need them now. He stated he will see what he could do  and asked if I could wait a few minutes. I waited for about 10 minutes when he returned with the shoe. I was immediately disappointed.The shoe looked like it had not been touched overall. It looked dusty as if it was sitting around without being covered and he attempted to give it a shameful brush.  Froom my past experience I have experience the repair person to either spray or polish a shoe once complete. On top of the dusty appearance , the shoe had black glue all over the heel , to the point where there was no longer any suede shown on the bottom, in addition there was a piece of suede that I was told could be covered and it wasn't, there was also a piece on the top that I was told could be fixed. He said give him a bit more time which i did , this time I left and returned 30 mins later.  I returned to the same dusty shoe , that still wasn't sprayed and had the same tear on the top. I was told there was no way they could repair that part because of the spandex lining. This shoe repair gave me a bunch of excuses why they could not repair my shoe once they had already taken my money and gave me the run around . DO NOT PAY THEM IN ADVANCE . They will sell you a bunch of false promises and failed to take accountability for there rush job. They refused to give me my money back and now I have to purchase some suede spray to see if I can fix what they didn't.  They were also unprofessional and rude , and this was by far the worst shoe repair service I have ever received.

originalText.text: It’s best shoe shine store nearby. And I like very kind and honest people in the store. Once I forgot a bag, I emailed them about the bag and they got in touch with me promptly in order to not worry about it. I could get it back next day. No worry at all
